headline: AEP (AEP) Valuation: How Does $54 Billion In Planned Infrastructure Investment Factor In?
summary: American Electric Power Company (AEP) has unveiled a $54 billion investment plan targeting infrastructure upgrades and renewable energy projects from 2025 to 2029. This long-term strategy emphasizes growth and resilience in the utility space. See our latest analysis for American Electric Power Company. Momentum around American Electric Power Company has been steady, with the stock holding its ground and delivering a 0.2% one-year total shareholder return. Recent fixed-income offerings and...
